Update to get all the new features and fixes! Update A New version of Topanimestream is downloading... Topanimestream update VideoActivity Changes Auto check for updates Check for updates everytime the app is launched Language Checking for updates... Welcome to Topanimestream! The google play version of Topanimestream is only available in Spanish, but what if you don\'t like watching animes in Spanish? Well, Topanimestream has a full version with which you can watch your animes in French, English and Spanish! Interrested? Get the full version! WebActivity Check for updates Manually check for updates Searching... Topanimestream upgraded to proYou have now Topanimestream Pro. The app is now ad-free* and you have now access to Google Chromecast. *Some providers may show ads in the video. You need the pro version of Topanimestream to play the video on a Chromecast device. Pro version needed Buy full version Loading favorites... An error has occured while loading the favorites. Try to login again. Deleting from favorite... An error has occurred while removing the favorite An error has occurred while adding the anime Adding to favorites... This source has only 240p available. Buy Topanimestream pro Topanimestream has 2 pro versions available. The first one (downloadable on Google Play) is in Spanish only with no ads and Chromecast support. The other one let you watch animes in English, French and Spanish and also have no ads and Chromecast support. Which one do you prefer? All languages Spanish only Bored of animes in Spanish only? Buy the full version of Topanimestream to get access to animes in English, French and Spanish! Service unavailable The services of Topanimestream are currently unavailable. We will be back shortly.
